clothing.models module¶

class clothing.models.Category(*args, **kwargs)¶

ベースクラス: mptt.models.MPTTModel

カテゴリ情報を保持するためのモデルです．

django-mptt を利用し， 親子関係について 入れ子集合モデル を用いて 管理しています．

exception DoesNotExist¶

ベースクラス: django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist

exception Category.MultipleObjectsReturned¶

ベースクラス: django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned

Category.children¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

Category.get_separator()¶
Category.objects = <mptt.managers.TreeManager object>¶
Category.parent¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Category.shop_item_related¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

Category.wardrobe_useritem_related¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

class clothing.models.Clothing(*args, **kwargs)¶

ベースクラス: django.db.models.base.Model

アイテム情報を保持できるようにする抽象クラスです．

UPLOAD_TO_DIR を上書きすることでimageの保存先ディレクトリを変更できます．

また， get_image_upload_to_path() をオーバーライドするとパス指定方法ごと変更することができます．

class Meta¶

ベースクラス: object

abstract = False¶
Clothing.ORIENTATION = ('landscape', 'portrait', 'square')¶
Clothing.UPLOAD_TO_DIR = 'images/'¶
Clothing.category¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

classmethod Clothing.get_image_upload_to_path(filename)¶

UPLOAD_TO_DIR/{uuid}.ext の形式でファイルを保存します．

Clothing.get_next_by_created(*moreargs, **morekwargs)¶
Clothing.get_next_by_updated(*moreargs, **morekwargs)¶
Clothing.get_previous_by_created(*moreargs, **morekwargs)¶
Clothing.get_previous_by_updated(*moreargs, **morekwargs)¶
Clothing.image¶

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.

Clothing.is_square_image¶
Clothing.orientation¶
clothing.models.auto_delete_image_on_change(sender, instance, **kwargs)¶
clothing.models.auto_delete_image_on_delete(sender, instance, **kwargs)¶

Clothingのサブクラスにおいて削除時にimageファイルも削除したいときは， この関数を post_delete 通知時に実行するよう設定してください．
